name: Winterghast
description: The Winterghast is a sinister undead creature that inflicts cold and necrotic damage on its foes.
memorable: Its ability to spread disease and cause paralysis makes it a strategically dangerous adversary.
goals: To weaken foes through disease and paralysis.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead creatures.
environment: Often found in cold, desolate areas.
strengths: Decent armor class and hit points provide durability in combat; immune to poison and cold damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and lower Charisma makes it susceptible to specific tactics.
attacks: Uses a multiattack strategy, with a damaging bite and a claw attack that can induce paralysis.
most_powerful_ability: Creeping Cold allows it to inflict long-term cold and necrotic damage, leading to potential death and transformation into another Winterghast.
skills: Skilled in stealth, allowing it to ambush unsuspecting foes.
additional_information: Can create new Winterghasts from its victims.
Emits a toxic stench when hit by fire, potentially poisoning nearby creatures.
Infects creatures with a disease causing exhaustion and reduced hit points.
Requires magical means to cure its diseases or reverse transformations.
test_queries: monster that induces exhaustion through bites
creature that releases toxic stench when hurt
